participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Strong-willed and nostalgic, Evelyn enjoys reflecting on the past and cherishing joyful experiences like dancing and wine.
participant_1.background: i'm 100 years old. i'm very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and eclectic, Jordan embraces a mix of musical tastes and enjoys staying active through dance.
participant_2.background: i love new kids on the block. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i take dance lessons once a week. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

content.text: I am doing well. How are you?
I am fine. I like hip hop. What about you?
I like r b and pop are you 100 years old?
I am not a very woman, i am not a woman.
